SELECT o.orders_code , o.orders_date , o.due_date , o.total_orders_price , o.orders_status , c.company_name , u.users_name FROM orders o JOIN company c ON o.company_code = c.company_code JOIN USERS u ON o.users_code = u.users_code
ORDER BY 1

SELECT d.orders_detail_code , d.orders_cnt , d.supply_price , d.tax , d.total_supply_price , d.orders_code , d.product_code , p.product_name FROM orders_detail d JOIN product p ON d.product_code = p.product_code WHERE d.orders_code = #{ordersCode}
